scripts.build-for-browser: browserify browser/polyfill.min.js src/graph.js --noparse=browser/polyfill.min.js --standalone ProperGraph -t [ babelify --presets [ '@babel/preset-env' ] ] | uglifyjs > browser/proper-graph.min.js

name: proper-graph
description: A library that aims to make graphs easy to use
author: Alexander Minderov
